Generate a demo 'terra::SpatRaster'

Source: R/data.R
demo_stack_spatraster.Rd

Generates a square demo terra::SpatRaster object with options to set the size (on disk) and number of layers.

demo_stack_spatraster(size = 50, layers = 5)

Arguments

size

[integer(1)]
Size of raster stack in megabyte (disk space).
layers

[integer(1)]
Number of layers.

Examples

demo_stack_spatraster(size = 5, layers = 2)
#> class       : SpatRaster 
#> dimensions  : 790, 790, 2  (nrow, ncol, nlyr)
#> resolution  : 0.001265823, 0.001265823  (x, y)
#> extent      : 0, 1, 0, 1  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> coord. ref. : lon/lat WGS 84 
#> sources     : filec7e5346de3af.tif  
#>               filec7e5ab0de2c.tif  
#> names       :       x_1,         y 
#> min values  : -4.589538,  0.000000 
#> max values  :  5.507922,  1.000000
